CustomField.description: Generates an external link to track the shipment based on the provided Courier and Tracking Number.
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Courier__c , "UPS"), Tracking_Number__c <>"" ),
HYPERLINK(("https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&tracknum=" & Tracking_Number__c ), ( TEXT(Courier__c)& " Tracking URL" )),
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Courier__c , "FedEx"), Tracking_Number__c <>"" ),
HYPERLINK(("https://www.fedex.com/apps/fedextrack/?action=track&trackingnumber=" & Tracking_Number__c ), ( TEXT(Courier__c)& " Tracking URL" )) ,
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Courier__c , "USPS"), Tracking_Number__c <>"" ),
HYPERLINK(("https://tools.usps.com/go/TrackConfirmAction?qtc_tLabels1=" & Tracking_Number__c ), ( TEXT(Courier__c)& " Tracking URL" )) ,
"") ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Opens a link to the Courier's website to track the shipment.
CustomField.label: Tracking URL
